About me

Currently studying Front-End Developer @ Noroff - School of technology and digital media.

I want to make a better web. One that is fast, easy to use, accessible to all and error-free. I started my journey to become a developer in october 2019, and after 14 years in sales I have found my passion. Learning new technologies and creating new projects are features I love in this profession.

I am currently learning Go - golang along with my studies. I believe Go will become a very important language in the future.

My goal is to be a Full-Stack Developer, because I like to know and understand what drives an application.
